des:
About us: https://iridi.com.
The skill helps to control iRidium projects with Amazon echo.
The skill works only with iRidium lite for now. iRidium pro support will be added soon.

Device types that can be controlled with Alexa: Air conditioner, Dimmer, Relay, Light, Audio player, Floor heating, Fan control, FM tuner, Dock station, Projector.
Audio players, FM tuners and projectors can only be turned on or off with Alexa.

How it works with i3 lite:
1. Upload a project with your devices onto iRidium cloud (if you already have your project on the cloud you can skip the step).
2. Go to https://iridi.com/my-account/services/, authorize and select your project. You will need the secret key to setup Amazon Echo module.
3. Add the "Amazon Echo" module to the project and enter the secret key.
4. Upload the project to iRidium server.
5. Enable the skill.
6. Authorize, select the project and press the "Grant access" button.
7. Discover devices.
8. Devices are ready and can be controlled with Amazon Echo.
To control a device, use the device name in i3 lite app.
If you made some changes in your project, do not forget to upload the new project to server and re-discover devices in Alexa app.
